title: Bug 11280 - Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives from Java to Resource and then back to Java, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. It reverts to its default size and position.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized when switching between perspectives. It should retain its maximized state as set by the user.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the Resource perspective. 4. Switch back to the Java perspective and observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
